queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with wildcard RBAC permissions provide excessive rights to the Kubernetes API and should be avoided. The principle of least privilege recommends to specify only the set of needed objects and actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[11].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[11].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[3].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[3].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[7].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[7].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[0].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[0].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[13].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[13].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[10].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[8].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[0].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[0].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[2].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[2].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[6].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[1].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[1].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[1].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[3].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[5].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[2].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[2].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[4].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[4].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[4].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[4].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{istio-operator}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{istio-operator}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

queries.description: The permission to create pods in a cluster should be restricted because it allows privilege escalation.

files.expected_value: metadata.name=istio-operator.rules.verbs should not contain a wildcard value when metadata.name=istio-operator.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'
files.actual_value: metadata.name=istio-operator.rules.verbs contains a wildcard value and metadata.name=istio-operator.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'

queries.description: Roles or ClusterRoles with RBAC permissions 'bind' or 'escalate' allow subjects to create new bindings with other roles. This is dangerous, as users with these privileges can bind to roles that may exceed their own privileges

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[11].verbs should not include the 'bind' and/or 'escalate' permission
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[11].verbs includes the 'bind' and/or 'escalate' permission

queries.description: Roles or ClusterRoles with RBAC permissions to port-forward into pods can open socket-level communication channels to containers. In case of compromise, attackers may abuse this for direct communication that bypasses network security restrictions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[13].resources should not include the 'pods/portforward' resource
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules[13].resources includes the 'pods/portforward' resource

queries.description: Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{istio-operator}}.readinessProbe should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{istio-operator}}.readinessProbe is undefined

queries.description: Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{istio-operator}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{istio-operator}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type is undefined

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken is undefined

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles when binded, should not use get, list or watch as verbs

files.expected_value: The metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["*"]]
files.actual_value: The metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.rules.verbs contain the following verbs: [["*"]]

queries.description: Namespaces like 'default', 'kube-system' or 'kube-public' should not be used

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
files.actual_value: 'metadata.namespace' is set to default

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
files.actual_value: 'metadata.namespace' is set to default

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
files.actual_value: 'metadata.namespace' is set to default

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{istio-operator}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{istio-operator}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{istio-operator}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{istio-operator}}

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.spec.ports.port={{8383}} has a Pod port
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-operator}}.spec.ports.port={{8383}} does not have a Pod port
